sentences.en: I suppose further that you need a precis of the idea so you can decide whether the suggestion is feasible and warrants more exploration.
sentences.cn: 我进一步假设您需要有一个大致的想法，以使得您可以决定那个建议是否切实 可行而且确保深入的研究。

sentences.en: Include only the essential points when you write a precis.
sentences.cn: 写大纲的时候,只要把重点包括进去就可以.

sentences.en: Precis this chapter in two pages.
sentences.cn: 用两页写出这一章的大意.
